name: Drishya Devan
text: The dialogue was witty and clever.

name: Dummy
text: I can't wait to see it again. I was completely swept up in the world of the film.

name: Yashvi Balan
text: A must-see for any movie lover. This movie deserves all the awards.

name: Jivika Uppal
text: This movie exceeded all my expectations. I was on the edge of my seat the entire time. The performances were absolutely captivating.

name: Kavya Tiwari
text: I've never seen anything quite like it before.

name: Miraya Aggarwal
text: I was completely captivated by the performances. I was left with a smile on my face. The movie was a revelation in storytelling.
